text: Three Days Grace is the first studio album by Canadian rock band, Three Days Grace. It was released on July 22, 2003. The producer of the album was Gavin Brown. The album peaked at #69 on the U.S. Billboard 200 and #9 on the Canadian Albums Chart. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2003 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Three Days Grace albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Three Days Grace (album)
